# Epilog {.unnumbered}

As you turn the final page of Cards & Stories, I hope you’ve glimpsed not just postcards, but the journeys, friendships, and memories they carry. Each card, whether collected in person or received from afar, is part of a larger story that continues to unfold.

This book is not an ending, but a pause—an open invitation for new postcards, new places, and new voices to join its pages. May it remind you that even the smallest tokens of travel can hold the greatest stories, and that our connections, like postcards, are meant to be shared and cherished across time and distance.

Until the next postcard finds its way here…
